results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project d87b22d30a8640aa8930a2cad2e2e1bf. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can’t log in when they have special characters in their password.
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests.

tool_calls.mcp_result: {"workunit":{"completed_tasks":0,"created_at":"2026-02-25T18:36:41Z","created_by":"3e3eeb7faeb5408a8ed4146eb15e5892","id":"fa46172c34a74256986de720e54c4d80","is_active":true,"linked_assets_count":0,"name":"Fix Login Page Bug","organization_id":"7ecc4c86996c489fa21c4f9231b5039f","owner_id":"3e3eeb7faeb5408a8ed4146eb15e5892","priority":"high","problem_statement":"Users can’t log in when they have special characters in their password.","project_id":"d87b22d30a8640aa8930a2cad2e2e1bf","status":"active","success_criteria":"All character types are supported and there are regression tests.","total_tasks":0,"updated_at":"2026-02-25T18:36:41Z"}}

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit fa46172c34a74256986de720e54c4d80:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests

results.prompt_sent: Mark task ba3603acee934fbc86790b7c16ddf13d as currently in progress.
Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.
model_responses: I apologize, it seems I made a mistake in assuming the workunit ID. Could you please provide the exact ID of the "Fix Login Page Bug" workunit? Once I have that, I can retrieve its details and tasks.

tool_calls.name: get_workunit

results.prompt_sent: Save a context note on workunit fa46172c34a74256986de720e54c4d80 recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.

arguments.title: Password validation fix location
arguments.content: We chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure.
